body:
Losing weight actually releases estrogen. Some guys even develop boobs from losing a lot of weight and need surgery to remove them.

I'm not sure I want higher levels of either, even though high levels can bring some positives I find sex hormones to be mostly an annoyance.
body_html:
Losing weight actually releases estrogen. Some guys even develop boobs from losing a lot of weight and need surgery to remove them.

I'm not sure I want higher levels of either, even though high levels can bring some positives I find sex hormones to be mostly an annoyance.

body:
The attractiveness one is debatable. I know some dudes that went from Elvis Presley to ProJared when they lost weight.

But I would have to say you have a lower chance of "contracting" GERD.

Which is a very annoying disorder that most males (regardless of health) acquire by 35.
body_html:
The attractiveness one is debatable. I know some dudes that went from Elvis Presley to ProJared when they lost weight.

But I would have to say you have a lower chance of "contracting" GERD.

Which is a very annoying disorder that most males (regardless of health) acquire by 35.
